subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_02A3_01C9D965.AF3FD450
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

My point was that they don't need to know how it works for it to work, like=
 my analogy of when I speak into a microphone. I don't know how that works,=
 but it does regardless.

"And consider this: if the spirit could make a no=
rmal tape recorder record by messing with the EMF field near its mic, and i=
t could make a digital recorder record by messing with the EMF field neat i=
ts mic, why would the spirit even need to delve deeper into the digital wor=
ld: what worked for the analog tape recorder, still works for the digital r=
ecorder, so why all the mindboggling extra effort for the same result?"

Th=
at's what I'm sayin' LOL! They wouldn't need know and it would still work.
=


"Maybe it's that you don't know how a digital recorder works?  It really =
doesn't just dump a lot of "digitals" into a nice neat strip, akin to how a=
n analog tape recorder does to tape.  To record digitally takes many levels=
 of processing, and a lot of careful digital choreography on the final medi=
a. "

I don't know how it works. But here again, I don't have to know and i=
t still works. I don't even know how exactly an analog recorder works eithe=
r. I have no clue how my voice can be transferred and recorded via electron=
ic means. But again, I don't need to know to make it work.


But I see what=
 you are saying and this does make sense:

"It is much more credible for th=
e signal to be manipulated near the AtoD converter (where EMF changes would=
 have the most straighforward result) than in the digital media itself."

I=
 never meant to insinuate exactly how it could or couldn't work, only that =
true EVP is not created via sound waves in the environment. It has to be el=
ectromagnetically generated. From this statement is seems that's entirely v=
erifiable.

EVP has been found on analog recordings. Would this also hold t=
rue for that kind of media?




  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rj =

  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 3:13 PM
  S=
ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.





        If the spirit doe=
sn't know how to make it happen, then it's reasonable to assume that they a=
re not making it happen.  It really does take a lot of know-how.

        A=
nd consider this: if the spirit could make a normal tape recorder record by=
 messing with the EMF field near its mic, and it could make a digital recor=
der record by messing with the EMF field neat its mic, why would the spirit=
 even need to delve deeper into the digital world: what worked for the anal=
og tape recorder, still works for the digital recorder, so why all the mind=
boggling extra effort for the same result?

        Maybe it's that you don=
't know how a digital recorder works?  It really doesn't just dump a lot of=
 "digitals" into a nice neat strip, akin to how an analog tape recorder doe=
s to tape.  To record digitally takes many levels of processing, and a lot =
of careful digital choreography on the final media.  \

        --- On Wed,=
 5/20/09, April Abercrombie <april@...> wrote:


 =
         From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
     =
     Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
          To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com
          Date: Wednesday, May 20, 2009, 1:56 PM


          =
=EF=BB=BF 

          I don't think they would have to know this to make it=
 happen. We already know it happens and I bet that the spirit doesn't know =
exactly how it accomplished it.

          Sure, there could be another fac=
tor that we just don't know about that makes EVP possible.

          "It i=
s much more credible for the signal to be manipulated near the AtoD convert=
er (where EMF changes would have the most straighforward result) than in th=
e digital media itself."

          Ok well-there you have it.

           =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Rj 
            To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups .com 
            Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 2:24 PM
     =
       Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



                  M=
anipulating EMF is one thing.  But directly storing bits on a media is way =
beyond that.  Bits are not stored in a continuous stream.  They are broken =
into bytes (little packets) that is totally controlled by the processor and=
 software.  For Elvis to "encode directly" to the media, he would have to d=
o what that software does to the digital signals coming in from the AtoD co=
nverter: he would have to group the bits into (for example) 16 little herds=
 each, decide on the specific bit interpretation scheme (2's complement?) ,=
  find space on the media, update the media's dictionary of where there is =
free space and where there isn't, link the herds together with some sort of=
 linked pointer, skip around the areas marked 'bad' on the media, update th=
ings like date/time modified and size, respect any kind of ownership permis=
sions on the media, and so on.

                  It is much more credible =
for the signal to be manipulated near the AtoD converter (where EMF changes=
 would have the most straighforward result) than in the digital media itsel=
f.

                  --- On Wed, 5/20/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercro=
mbiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


                    From: April Abercromb=
ie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com>
                    Subject: Re: =
[EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
                    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s .com
                    Date: Wednesday, May 20, 2009, 1:05 PM


       =
             =EF=BB=BF 

                    "Probably not "directly", sinc=
e that would mean grandma would have to have quite an understanding of digi=
tal encoding, including which bits mean what, when, and where."

          =
          Not necessarily- maybe it is that just by trying to communicate t=
hrough our equipment, it happens automatically. They don't have to realize =
that they are manipulating the EMF to make it occur, it just happens. It's =
the nature of being of pure energy.

                      ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
                      From: Rj 
                      To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                      Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 =
1:55 PM
                      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.=




                            Probably not "directly", since that would m=
ean grandma would have to have quite an understanding of digital encoding, =
including which bits mean what, when, and where.  But even on a digital rec=
order, there is still an analog element (the Analog to Digital converter) w=
hich takes the sound pressure waves, as represented by some analog electron=
ic detection element, and converts that into digital.  That way, long depar=
ted uncle Ebenezer does not need to do anything digital.  Under this scenar=
io, if sound is not being heard in the room, but is being induced into the =
circuitry, then it would be round about that AtoD converter (assuming it is=
n't other just plain old noise in the digital elements).  

               =
             Someone with more electronic know-how than me might be able to=
 better pinpoint the area in the analog portion of that AtoD pipeline where=
 it would be most likely it could be influenced by, say, an EM field, and t=
hat would also occur in a normal analog tape recorder.

                   =
          
                            --- On Wed, 5/20/09, April Abercromb=
ie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


                        =
      From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com>
      =
                        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
     =
                         To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                     =
         Date: Wednesday, May 20, 2009, 12:29 PM



                       =
       This is what I think true EVP is Eric. Not and actual sound emitting=
 a sound wave in the environment, but EMF manipulation in order to imprint =
the message directly to the recording media. It doesn't matter if it is ana=
log or digital.

                              If the sound that is recorde=
d emitted a sound wave in the physical environment, then it is really a dis=
embodied voice, and not true EVP.

                                ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
                                From: Eric VanDuzer 
=
                                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
             =
                   Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:16 AM
                 =
               Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.


            =
                    Actually that I would buy into  But the question I have=
 when you say "tape" are you talking old analog tape or digi recording.  He=
re is the reason I believe it can be do "real-time".  As you all know we us=
e electromagnetic Field detectors in field investigations.  If a spirit can=
 manipulate that with to show that they are there by giving off a EM field =
whose to say they can't manipulate a magnetic strip of a tape or even the e=
lectronics in a Digi recorder to speak in "real-time".



                 =
               On Wed, May 20, 2009 at 1:01 PM, Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@=
sbcgloba l.net> wrote:





                                Okay I have ano=
ther one for you to think about.. I tape a session and review it later..  e=
ven a day later.  Upon review the message that comes over is about somethin=
g that =E2=80=98just happened=E2=80=99 while I was reviewing or happened af=
ter taping?  Is it possible that spirit can manipulate the recording AFTER =
recording has stopped or even manipulate the audio while reviewing?



    =
                            An give you an example of this I was recording =
one day and I reviewed the audio the next day.  While reviewing =E2=80=93 a=
bout half way through =E2=80=93 the message =E2=80=9CYour mother is calling=
=E2=80=9D was found.  I saved it and moved on and within two seconds my mom=
 called.  You say it is a coincidence except that I hadn=E2=80=99t spoken t=
o my mother in over a year.  During this same conversation with her =E2=80=
=93 we sorta made amends and I told her the story of the =E2=80=98secret=E2=
=80=99 I had found out about a family member having a child out of wedlock =
in the late 1920s.  Quick backstory.. I found out about this out-of-wedlock=
 birth through my genealogy research and contacted spirit through the box a=
nd I was promptly told to keep it secret and which I promised to do=E2=80=
=A6



                                Well in this conversation with my mo=
m after not speaking for a year I told her what I had found out.  When the =
telephone conversation ended with my mom=E2=80=A6 I was amazed that the rec=
ording had told me she would call right be fore she did =E2=80=93 even thou=
gh the audio was recorded the previous day.  I proceeded to go back to revi=
ewing the audio and the very first thing I heard was:  THAT WAS SUPPOSED TO=
 BE A SECRET =E2=80=93 YOU LIED.



                                Maybe t=
hey can manipulate =E2=80=98real-time=E2=80=99 literally??? ?



          =
                      k




-----------------------------------------------=
-

                                From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto:E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups .com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
                   =
             Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:36 AM 


                    =
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

                                S=
ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.











                   =
             2 different things happening-that' s why. When you get EVP tha=
t everyone understands,  it is outward, in the environment. Not a communica=
tion through subconscious means.



                                EVP tha=
t people swear they hear, but noone else can make sense, may be a message t=
o them via subconscious means. That isn't to say that ALL EVP's like this a=
re true messages, I am sure alot are just matrixing.



                   =
             But then that is how the art of scrying starts-matrixing. Like=
 the Rorschach tests. The images you matrix with those gives the psychologi=
st an insight into your mind.



                                By gazing =
into a dark, reflective surface, you start to see cloudy images. At first, =
you will just be matrixing faces in the clouds and not getting much substan=
ce. Try it, you will see what I am saying. With practice, you start to see =
clear, concise images.



                                I think that is w=
hat happening with audio as well.



                                We alr=
eady know for a fact pareidolia can occur in audio as well as visual stimul=
us.



                                ----- Original Message ----- 

     =
                           From: Eric VanDuzer 

                          =
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 

                                Sent: =
Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:19 AM

                                Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



                                yes=
 I understand its personal to that particular individual but why can't I he=
ar it.  I have gotten some very personal EVPs through the traditional inves=
tigation way (not through a box or anything of that matter) that all others=
 have heard.

                                On Wed, May 20, 2009 at 12:15=
 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:



   =
                             "If one person is not meant to hear it they wo=
n't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to believe that one right yet)." =




                                I don't know for sure about that one ei=
ther, but I am not ready to discount it either, especially since I stumbled=
 across the possibility of audible scrying. But I am sure alot of people do=
n't believe in scrying at all either.



                                Wh=
at makes it a possibility to me is that so many people are hearing things t=
hat are very personal, but stuff they would not have come up with on their =
own.





                                ----- Original Message ----- 

  =
                              From: Eric VanDuzer 

                       =
         To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 

                                Sen=
t: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:09 AM

                                Subjec=
t: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



                                =
I think that is the problem I am having though Jim.  When you say "work the=
m over till you hear them"  to me I should not have to work them over till =
I hear them.  Yes taking out the ambient and background noise is one thing.=
  But if you just keep on listening to them with different enhancements you=
 are bound to hear something (matrixing).  If one person is not meant to he=
ar it they won't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to believe that one =
right yet).  I think you all know what I am getting at.  

                =
                On Tue, May 19, 2009 at 9:11 PM, James W. Hyslope <clockdry=
ve@yahoo. com> wrote:



                                Well, for myself..=
.I don't "clean" them up to much because I really don't know HOW :) (well a=
 little bit)Since I've only been at it for a couple weeks. BUT if you can c=
lean up something to where you can FIND what was there to begin with "you h=
ave done no harm" I hear alot more than others I guess, and I haven't enhan=
ced many of my evp's.*If anyone is able to clean them up...I DO promise you=
 will hear what I say is correct)Pretty BOLD statement, but if you are able=
 to clean it up with better software (please do for others too) I will be m=
ore than happy to "listen" where I made a mistake...I can only LEARN from i=
t :) I have done some DEEP enhancements to a few of my evp's...from the beg=
ining I could only hear clicks and thumps.....but after messing with that a=
rea, eventually I would hear the true voices (and can tell if male or femal=
e...approximat e age) and understand the mood also....these where extreamly=
 modified, and I feel that I could NOT have added enough "simple" enhanceme=
nts that would ADD a voice....full of emotion and distinct syllables :) And=
 some just can't hear them for what ever reason be it equipment that is use=
d to hear (pc-headphones- speakers- ears) know one has the perfect match of=
 all these things. Check out "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" in the files section....=
work them over till you hear them. I really can't do much more :)--- In EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Eric VanDuzer <evanduzer@.. .> wrote:
              =
                  >
                                > Now I may be biased t=
o the "investigation" way of doing things. I do clean
                     =
           > up evps if I hear something and can't make it out do to ambien=
t noise. So
                                > hear is my question. When do =
you stop cleaning up? Wouldn't to much
                                > en=
hancing "taint" the results? To me the more enhancing you do the less
     =
                           > convincing it becomes. I hope noone finds this=
 offensive, it is not meant
                                > to be I am ju=
st really curious. The way I look at it is that if you have to
            =
                    > do so much enhancing to find anything, was there real=
ly something there to
                                > begin with. Are we =
just making ourselves believe there is something there??
                  =
              > 
                                > Eric
                   =
             >







                           


                 


   =

>Manipulating EMF is one thing.  But 
                  directly stori=
ng bits on a media is way beyond that.  
                  Bits are no=
t stored in a continuous stream.  They are 
                  broken i=
nto bytes (little packets) that is totally controlled 
                  by=
 the processor and software.  For Elvis to "encode 
                  =
directly" to the media, he would have to do what that software 
           =
       does to the digital signals coming in from the AtoD converter: 
    =
              he would have to group the bits into (for example) 16 little =

                  herds each, decide on the specific bit interpretation sc=
heme 
                  (2's complement?) ,  find space on the media, =
update the 
                  media's dictionary of where there is free spa=
ce and where 
                  there isn't, link the herds together with s=
ome sort of linked 
                  pointer, skip around the areas marked=
 'bad' on the media, 
                  update things like date/time modifi=
ed and size, respect any 
                  kind of ownership permissions o=
n the media, and so 
                  on.<BR><BR>It is much more credible =
for the signal to be 
                  manipulated near the AtoD converter=
 (where EMF changes would 
                  have the most straighforward r=
esult) than in the digital media 
                  itself.<BR><BR>--- On <=
B>Wed, 5/20/09, April Abercrombie 
                  <I><april@abercromb=
iegh ostresearch. com></I></B> 
                  wrote:<BR>
